Vídeo de carta psicrométrica em DWSIM com um pouco de python script dentro do DWSIM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npru6v-Pr94&ab_channel=CascaGrossaSuprema

Idea of pyDWSIMopt package:
pyDWSIMopt:
    interface:
        Stabilish interface
        Create DWSIM object
    optProblem:
        Define f_obj
        Define g_i, i=1,...,p
        Define x, xlo, xup
Examples:
    use pyDWSIMopt with different simulations & solvers
